questions.question: According to the framework that defines product innovations, there is an incremental innovation when:
answers: Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
questions.correctAnswer: Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are reinforced

questions.question: According to the framework that defines product innovations, there is an architectural innovation when:
answers: Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
questions.correctAnswer: Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are reinforced

questions.question: According to the framework that defines product innovations, there is an modular innovation when:
answers: Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
questions.correctAnswer: Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are substituted

questions.question: According to the framework that defines product innovations, there is an radical innovation when:
answers: Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
Architecture Relations are unchanged, and Knowledge Components are substituted
Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are reinforced
questions.correctAnswer: a. Architecture Relations are altered, and Knowledge Components are substituted

questions.question: In the competitive strategy, the question “Who are our customers?” is connected to the following strategic dimension:
answers: It is connected to all of them

questions.question: In the competitive strategy, the question “What do we offer them?” is connected to the following strategic dimension:
answers: It is connected to all of them

questions.question: In the competitive strategy, the question “How can we deliver it effectively and efficiently?” is connected to the following strategic dimension:
answers: It is connected to all of them

questions.question: Which of these is not a source of strategic innovation?
Defining the target market and identifying consumer unfulfilled needs allows companies to pursue a:
Developing innovative products or services and providing a unique meaning to existing goods enables companies to pursue a:
